DATA.TEXT: You've heard a lot about this planet - the only remaining rock from the Solar Wars...

DATA.APPEND_TEXT: and the stage of a recent battle in the current conflict.

DATA.TEXT: When you touch down, at first, it seems the planet is deserted. Only collapsed buildings and fallen debris are to be seen around you.
A soldier appears from one of the ruins, carefully walking towards you.
This is what we call war, kid.
What are you doing on this god-forsaken planet? Got nothing better to do on Pudding Day?
N-No, mister, we're just here to deliver something...
Hm. First of all, I'm Joel Walker, the soldier-commander-major of the twenty-first division of the north-west planet coalition.
And second of all... have I seen you before? Are you someone important's kid or something?
General Clayton's kid, huh? Interesting, I see.
You, you said you came here to deliver a package, right? You didn't happen to look inside it first, did you?
Um, actually, we've seen all the packages we're carrying, already...
O-Oh. Well, don't judge me too harshly about it, alright?
